content: HBC-C-N Notched T-bolt Notched T-bolts for tension, perpendicular and parallel shear loads (3D loads) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Bolts & washers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Notched T-bolts for reliable load transfer in all three dimensions ICC-EC and ETA reports for longitudinal loads – providing transparent and reliable performance data Evaluated for use in earthquake-resistant structures – ICC report describes the conditions for safe seismic design High-productivity, high-speed installation solution – no drilling or welding needed Universal fit – the same T-bolts can be used in HAC-40 to HAC-70 anchor channels to help simplify logistics and reduce the scope for errors Applications For use with HAC-40 to HAC-70 anchor channels ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized Compatible Anchor Channel: HAC-40, HAC-50, HAC-60, HAC-70 Channel profile: HAC-V 35, HAC-V 40, HAC-V 50, HAC-V 60, HAC-V 70, HAC-V Rebar XTS, HAC-V EDGE Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized | Compatible Anchor Channel | HAC-40, HAC-50, HAC-60, HAC-70 | Channel profile | HAC-V 35, HAC-V 40, HAC-V 50, HAC-V 60, HAC-V 70, HAC-V Rebar XTS, HAC-V EDGE | PROFIS Software | Yes | Product type | T-bolts ### ITEMS- 2237138 - T-head bolt HBC-C-N M12x40 8.8F - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HBC-C-N M12x40 8.8 F T-head bolt - 1x DIN934-M12-8-tZn Hexagon nut - 1x 12 Washer hot dip galv - 2237139 - T-head bolt HBC-C-N M16x50 8.8F -
